description: Number of connected 3 X n binary matrices with rightmost column [1,0,0]'.
comments: A connected (0,1) matrix is one where you can get from any black square, i.e. a 1, to any other by chess king moves.
references: R. Levy and J. Shapiro, Uniqueness in paint-by-numbers puzzles, preprint, 2000.
links: Vincenzo Librandi, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..1000
Index entries for linear recurrences with constant coefficients, signature (7,-3,5).
prog: (MAGMA) I:=[1, 5, 37]; [n le 3 select I[n] else 7*Self(n-1)-3*Self(n-2)+5*Self(n-3): n in [1..30]]; // _Vincenzo Librandi_, Apr 28 2012
author: _N. J. A. Sloane_, May 22 2000
extensions: More terms from _James A. Sellers_, May 23 2000
